main event: On 12 May 1958, an egg-shaped object emitting a tumbling light was observed near Cheyenne, Wyoming.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 30 minutes,The object was described as white or silver in color,The object's identity was concluded as possibly a balloon or astronomical phenomena,It was eventually verified as a jet aircraft performing aerobatics,Two observers, Mr. and Mrs. Curtis, were confirmed to have witnessed the sighting.
sighted object: one egg-shaped object with tumbling light
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. Curtis, both with good vision
